txt.en: Imrahil can be found at Aragorn's Pavilion, just outside the walls of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should find and speak with Imrahil.
Imrahil can be found just outside the walls of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should speak with Imrahil.
The horse to after-battle Minas Tirith can be found in the Threshold of the City, or in Minas Tirith pre-battle.\n\nTake the horse to after-battle Minas Tirith so that you may meet with Imrahil.
Take the horse to Minas Tirith, After the Battle
'Ah, [placeholder], I am glad you were able to come so quickly to aid the efforts here. There is much to be done.'
After the Battle of the Pelennor Fields, Imrahil has summoned you to aid the great city of Minas Tirith.
Imrahil can be found just outside the city walls of Minas Tirith

The Battle of the Pelennor Fields is at an end and Gondor has seen victory on this day. However, the city of Minas Tirith has succumbed to much death and destruction. Imrahil, Prince of Dol Amroth, has summoned you to his side as he begins the task of rebuilding the White City.
The horse to after-battle Minas Tirith can be found in the Threshold of the City, or in Minas Tirith pre-battle.\n\nTake the horse to after-battle Minas Tirith so that you may meet with Imrahil.
Imrahil can be found just outside the city walls of Minas Tirith
Take the horse to Minas Tirith, After the Battle
The pavilion is bustling with soldiers, but you manage to spot Imrahil
